data.name: Sample - Anomali ThreatStream - 2.5.1
data.description: Anomali ThreatStream offers the most comprehensive Threat Intelligence Platform, allowing organizations to access all intelligence feeds and integrate it seamlessly with internal security and IT systems. This connector facilitates automated operations to to pull threat intelligence from the ThreatStream platform, import observables into ThreatStream from any source, manage threat model entities and investigations, and so on.

workflows.name: Get Threat Bulletin List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all threat bulletins or specific threat bulletins based on the search query and other input parameters that you have specified.

workflows.name: Anomali ThreatStream > Ingest
workflows.description: Fetch Incidents from Anomali ThreatStream

arguments.alerts_status_map: {'New, Open, Incident Reported': {{'AlertStatus'| picklist('Open') }}, 'Containment Achieved, Restoration Achieved': {{'AlertStatus'| picklist('Investigating') }}, 'Stalled': {{'AlertStatus'| picklist('Pending') }}, 'Closed, Rejected, Deleted': {{'AlertStatus'| picklist('Closed') }}}

resource.name: {{vars.item["name"]}}
resource.source: Anomali ThreatStream Incident: {%if vars.item["circles"] | length > 0 %} {{vars.item["circles"][0]["name"]}} {%else %} Anomali ThreatStream {%endif %}

routes.name: Create Record -> Update Last Incident Fetch Macro

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all observables associated with a specific threat bulletin based on the threat bulletin ID and other input parameters that you have specified.

workflows.description: Imports threat data (indicators) into ThreatStream and requires the approval of the imported data through the ThreatStream UI.
workflows.name: Submit Observables

workflows.description: Approves the specific import job in ThreatStream based on the import ID you have specified.
workflows.name: Approve IOC By Import ID

routes.name: Start-> Approve IOC By Import ID

workflows.description: Retrieves the enrichment data using third-party Threat Intelligence (TI) tools, such as Recorded Future, Risk IQ, etc. for a specific observable.

workflows.description: Creates an incident in ThreatStream based on the name, tags, and other input parameters that you have specified.

params.value:
Anomali ThreatStream Detection Summary
Confidence
{% if vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].confidence >= (vars.malicious_score.split('-')[1] | int) %}
{{vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].confidence}}
{% elif vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].confidence <= (vars.suspicious_score.split('-')[0] | int) and vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].confidence >= (vars.suspicious_score.split('-')[1] | int) %}
{{vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].confidence}}
{% elif vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].confidence <= (vars.good_score.split('-')[0] | int) and vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].confidence >= (vars.good_score.split('-')[1] | int) %}
{{vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].confidence}}
{% else %}
{{vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].confidence}}
{% endif %}
Severity
{% if vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].meta.severity == 'very-high' %}
{{vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].meta.severity}}
{% elif vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].meta.severity in ['high', 'medium'] %}
{{vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].meta.severity}}
{% elif vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].meta.severity == 'low' %}
{{vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].meta.severity}}
{% else %}
{{vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].meta.severity}}
{% endif %}
Threat Score
{% if vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].threatscore >= 65 %}
{{vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].threatscore}}
{% elif vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].threatscore >= 25 and vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].threatscore < 65 %}
{{vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].threatscore}}

{{vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].threatscore}}
{% else %}
{{vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].threatscore}}
{% endif %}

arguments.verdict: {% if vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].confidence >= (vars.malicious_score.split('-')[1] | int) %}{{"Malicious"}}{% elif vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].confidence <= (vars.suspicious_score.split('-')[0] | int) and vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].confidence >= (vars.suspicious_score.split('-')[1] | int) %}{{"Suspicious"}}{% elif vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].confidence <= (vars.good_score.split('-')[0] | int) and vars.steps.Get_File_Reputation.data.objects[0].confidence >= (vars.good_score.split('-')[1] | int) %}{{"Good"}}{% else %}{{"No Reputation Available"}}{% endif %}

workflows.description: Fetch Incidents from Anomali ThreatStream

step_variables._configuration_schema:
[
        {
          "title": "Search Query",
          "required": true,
          "editable": true,
          "visible": true,
          "type": "text",
          "name": "search_query",
          "value": "",
          "placeholder": "created_ts__gte=2019-01-28T21:04:14",
          "description": "Valid search query to filter out the incidents "
        },
        {
          "title": "Number of Incidents to Fetch",
          "required": true,
          "editable": true,
          "visible": true,
          "type": "integer",
          "name": "number_of_incidents_to_fetch",
          "value": 0,
          "tooltip": "Specifying 0 will return up to a maximum of 1000 results (if available). Max limit is 1000",
          "description": "Maximum number of results that this operation should return."
        },
        {
          "title": "Fetch Incidents in Last X min",
          "required": true,
          "editable": true,
          "visible": true,
          "type": "integer",
          "name": "fetch_incidents_in_last_X_minutes",
          "value": 10
        }
      ]
